00067 #include "cfe_psp.h"

00077 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00078 /*                                                                 */
00079 /* Idle Task Main Process Loop                                     */
00080 /*                                                                 */
00081 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00082 
00083 void HS_IdleTask(void)
00084 {
00085     OS_time_t PSPTime = {0,0};
00086 
00087     HS_CustomData.IdleTaskRunStatus = CFE_ES_RegisterChildTask();
00088 
00089     while (HS_CustomData.IdleTaskRunStatus == CFE_SUCCESS)
00090     {
00091 
00092         /* Check to see if we are to mark the time. */
00093         if(((HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec & HS_CustomData.UtilMask) == HS_CustomData.UtilMask) &&
00094            (HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec > HS_CustomData.UtilMask))
00095         {
00096             /* Entry and Exit markers are for easy time marking only; not performance */
00097             CFE_ES_PerfLogEntry(HS_IDLETASK_PERF_ID);
00098 
00099             /* Increment the child task Execution Counter */
00100             CFE_ES_IncrementTaskCounter();
00101 
00102             /* update stamp and array */
00103             CFE_PSP_GetTime(&PSPTime);
00104             HS_CustomData.UtilArray[HS_CustomData.UtilArrayIndex & HS_CustomData.UtilArrayMask] = (uint32) PSPTime.microsecs;
00105             HS_CustomData.UtilArrayIndex++;
00106 
00107             CFE_ES_PerfLogExit(HS_IDLETASK_PERF_ID);
00108         }
00109 
00110         /* Call the Utilization Tracking function */
00111         HS_UtilizationIncrement();
00112 
00113     }
00114 
00115     /*
00116     ** If the run status is externally set to something else
00117     */
00118     return;
00119 
00120 } /* End of HS_IdleTask() */
00121 
00122 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00123 /*                                                                 */
00124 /* Initialize The Idle Task                                        */
00125 /*                                                                 */
00126 /* NOTE: For complete prolog information, see 'hs_custom.h'        */
00127 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00128 int32 HS_CustomInit(void)
00129 {
00130     int32 Status = CFE_SUCCESS;
00131 
00132     /*
00133     ** Spawn the Idle Task
00134     */
00135     Status = CFE_ES_CreateChildTask(&HS_CustomData.IdleTaskID,      
00136                                      HS_IDLE_TASK_NAME,       
00137                                      HS_IdleTask,         
00138                                      HS_IDLE_TASK_STACK_PTR,  
00139                                      HS_IDLE_TASK_STACK_SIZE, 
00140                                      HS_IDLE_TASK_PRIORITY,   
00141                                      HS_IDLE_TASK_FLAGS);     
00142      
00143     if(Status != CFE_SUCCESS)
00144     {
00145         CFE_EVS_SendEvent(HS_CR_CHILD_TASK_ERR_EID, CFE_EVS_ERROR,
00146                           "Error Creating Child Task for CPU Utilization Monitoring,RC=0x%08X",
00147                           (unsigned int)Status);
00148         return (Status);
00149     }
00150 
00151     /*
00152     ** Connect to CFE TIME's time reference marker (typically 1 Hz) for Idle Task Marking
00153     */
00154     Status = CFE_TIME_RegisterSynchCallback((CFE_TIME_SynchCallbackPtr_t)&HS_MarkIdleCallback);
00155     if (Status != CFE_SUCCESS)
00156     {
00157         CFE_EVS_SendEvent(HS_CR_SYNC_CALLBACK_ERR_EID, CFE_EVS_ERROR,
00158                           "Error Registering Sync Callback for CPU Utilization Monitoring,RC=0x%08X",
00159                           (unsigned int)Status);
00160     }
00161 
00162     HS_CustomData.UtilMult1 = HS_UTIL_CONV_MULT1;
00163     HS_CustomData.UtilMult2 = HS_UTIL_CONV_MULT2;
00164     HS_CustomData.UtilDiv   = HS_UTIL_CONV_DIV;
00165     HS_CustomData.UtilMask  = HS_UTIL_DIAG_MASK;
00166     HS_CustomData.UtilCycleCounter = 0;
00167     HS_CustomData.UtilArrayIndex = 0;
00168     HS_CustomData.UtilArrayMask = HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_MASK;
00169     HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec = 0;
00170     HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskExec = 0;
00171     HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskInterval = 0;
00172 
00173     return(Status);
00174 
00175 } /* end HS_CustomInit */
00176 
00177 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00178 /*                                                                 */
00179 /* Terminate The Idle Task                                         */
00180 /*                                                                 */
00181 /* NOTE: For complete prolog information, see 'hs_custom.h'        */
00182 /*                                                                 */
00183 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00184 void HS_CustomCleanup(void)
00185 {
00186     /*
00187     ** Unregister the Sync Callback for CPU Monitoring
00188     */
00189     CFE_TIME_UnregisterSynchCallback((CFE_TIME_SynchCallbackPtr_t)&HS_MarkIdleCallback);
00190 
00191     /*
00192     ** Force the Idle Task to stop running
00193     */
00194     HS_CustomData.IdleTaskRunStatus = !CFE_SUCCESS;
00195 
00196     /*
00197     ** Delete the Idle Task
00198     */
00199     CFE_ES_DeleteChildTask(HS_CustomData.IdleTaskID);
00200 
00201 } /* end HS_CustomCleanup */
00202 
00203 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00204 /*                                                                 */
00205 /* Increment the Utilization Counter                               */
00206 /*                                                                 */
00207 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00208 void HS_UtilizationIncrement(void)
00209 {
00210     HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec++;
00211 
00212     return;
00213 
00214 } /* end HS_UtilizationIncrement */
00215 
00216 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00217 /*                                                                 */
00218 /* Mark the Utilization Counter                                    */
00219 /*                                                                 */
00220 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00221 void HS_UtilizationMark(void)
00222 {
00223     static uint32 CycleCount = 0;
00224 
00225     CycleCount++;
00226 
00227     if(CycleCount >= HS_UTIL_CALLS_PER_MARK)
00228     {
00229        HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskInterval = HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec - HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskExec;
00230        HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskExec = HS_CustomData.ThisIdleTaskExec;
00231        CycleCount = 0;
00232     }
00233 
00234     return;
00235 
00236 } /* end HS_UtilizationMark */
00237 
00238 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00239 /*                                                                 */
00240 /* Callback function that marks the Idle time                      */
00241 /*                                                                 */
00242 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00243 void HS_MarkIdleCallback(void)
00244 {
00245     /*
00246     ** Capture the CPU Utilization (at a consistant time)
00247     */
00248     HS_UtilizationMark();
00249 
00250     return;
00251 
00252 } /* End of HS_MarkIdleCallback() */
00253 
00254 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00255 /*                                                                 */
00256 /* Performs Utilization Monitoring and reporting                   */
00257 /*                                                                 */
00258 /* NOTE: For complete prolog information, see 'hs_custom.h'        */
00259 /*                                                                 */
00260 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00261 void HS_CustomMonitorUtilization(void)
00262 {
00263     HS_CustomData.UtilCycleCounter++;
00264     if (HS_CustomData.UtilCycleCounter >= HS_UTIL_CYCLES_PER_INTERVAL)
00265     {
00266         HS_MonitorUtilization();
00267         HS_CustomData.UtilCycleCounter = 0;
00268     }
00269 
00270 } /* End of HS_CustomMonitorUtilization() */
00271 
00272 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00273 /*                                                                 */
00274 /* Processes any additional commands                               */
00275 /*                                                                 */
00276 /* NOTE: For complete prolog information, see 'hs_custom.h'        */
00277 /*                                                                 */
00278 /* This function MUST return CFE_SUCCESS if any command is found   */
00279 /* and must NOT return CFE_SUCCESS if no command was found         */
00280 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00281 int32 HS_CustomCommands(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr)
00282 {
00283     int32 Status = CFE_SUCCESS;
00284 
00285     uint16          CommandCode = 0;
00286 
00287     CommandCode = CFE_SB_GetCmdCode(MessagePtr);
00288     switch (CommandCode)
00289     {
00290         case HS_REPORT_DIAG_CC:
00291             HS_UtilDiagReport();
00292             break;
00293 
00294         case HS_SET_UTIL_PARAMS_CC:
00295             HS_SetUtilParamsCmd(MessagePtr);
00296             break;
00297 
00298         case HS_SET_UTIL_DIAG_CC:
00299             HS_SetUtilDiagCmd(MessagePtr);
00300             break;
00301 
00302         default:
00303             Status = !CFE_SUCCESS;
00304             break;
00305 
00306     } /* end CommandCode switch */
00307 
00308     return Status;
00309 
00310 } /* End of HS_CustomCommands() */
00311 
00312 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00313 /*                                                                 */
00314 /* Report Utilization Diagnostics Information                      */
00315 /*                                                                 */
00316 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00317 void HS_UtilDiagReport(void)
00318 {
00319     uint32 DiagValue[HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH];
00320     uint32 DiagCount[HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH];
00321     uint32 i = 0;
00322     uint32 j = 0;
00323     uint32 ThisValue = 0;
00324     boolean MatchFound = FALSE;
00325     
00326     uint32 Ordinal = 0;
00327     uint32 NewOrdinalIndex = 0;
00328     uint32 OutputValue[HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS];
00329     uint32 OutputCount[HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS];
00330     uint32 OutputOrdinal[HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS];
00331 
00332     /* Initialize the arrays */
00333     for(i=0; i < HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH; i++)
00334     {
00335         DiagValue[i] = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00336         DiagCount[i] = 0;
00337     }
00338     for(i=0; i < HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS; i++)
00339     {
00340         OutputValue[i] = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00341         OutputCount[i] = 0;
00342         OutputOrdinal[i] = i;
00343     }
00344 
00345     /* Populate the arrays */
00346     for(i = 0; i < HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH; i++)
00347     {
00348         if(i == 0)
00349         {
00350             ThisValue = HS_CustomData.UtilArray[i] - HS_CustomData.UtilArray[HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH - 1];
00351         }
00352         else
00353         {
00354             ThisValue = HS_CustomData.UtilArray[i] - HS_CustomData.UtilArray[i - 1];
00355         }
00356         
00357         j = 0;
00358         MatchFound = FALSE;
00359         while((MatchFound == FALSE) && (j < HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH))
00360         {
00361             if(ThisValue == DiagValue[j])
00362             {
00363                 DiagCount[j]++;
00364                 MatchFound = TRUE;
00365             }
00366             else if (DiagValue[j] == 0xFFFFFFFF)
00367             {
00368                 DiagValue[j] = ThisValue;
00369                 DiagCount[j]++;
00370                 MatchFound = TRUE;
00371             }
00372             else
00373             {
00374                 j++;
00375             }
00376         }
00377 
00378     }
00379 
00380     /* Calculate the lowest time jumps */
00381     i = 0;
00382     while((DiagValue[i] != 0xFFFFFFFF) && (i < HS_UTIL_TIME_DIAG_ARRAY_LENGTH))
00383     {
00384         Ordinal = 0;
00385         for(j = 0; j < HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS; j++)
00386         {
00387             if (OutputValue[j] < DiagValue[i])
00388             {
00389                 Ordinal++;
00390             }
00391         }
00392         if(Ordinal < HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS)
00393         {
00394             /* Take over the outputs occupied by the current last */
00395             NewOrdinalIndex = OutputOrdinal[HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS - 1];
00396             OutputValue[NewOrdinalIndex] = DiagValue[i];
00397             OutputCount[NewOrdinalIndex] = DiagCount[i];
00398             
00399             /* Slide everything else down */
00400             for(j = HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS - 1; j > Ordinal; j--)
00401             {
00402                  OutputOrdinal[j] = OutputOrdinal[j - 1];
00403             }
00404 
00405             /* Point to the new output */
00406             OutputOrdinal[Ordinal] = NewOrdinalIndex;
00407 
00408         }
00409 
00410         i++;
00411     }
00412     
00413     /* Output the HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORTS as en event */
00414     CFE_EVS_SendEvent(HS_UTIL_DIAG_REPORT_EID, CFE_EVS_INFORMATION,
00415                       "Mask 0x%08X Base Time Ticks per Idle Ticks (frequency): %i(%i), %i(%i), %i(%i), %i(%i)", (unsigned int)HS_CustomData.UtilMask,
00416                        (int)OutputValue[OutputOrdinal[0]], (int)OutputCount[OutputOrdinal[0]], (int)OutputValue[OutputOrdinal[1]], (int)OutputCount[OutputOrdinal[1]], 
00417                        (int)OutputValue[OutputOrdinal[2]], (int)OutputCount[OutputOrdinal[2]], (int)OutputValue[OutputOrdinal[3]], (int)OutputCount[OutputOrdinal[3]]);
00418 
00419     return;
00420 
00421 } /* end HS_UtilDiagReport */
00422 
00423 
00424 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00425 /*                                                                 */
00426 /* Report Utilization                                              */
00427 /*                                                                 */
00428 /* NOTE: For complete prolog information, see 'hs_custom.h'        */
00429 /*                                                                 */
00430 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00431 int32 HS_CustomGetUtil(void)
00432 {
00433    int32 CurrentUtil = 0;
00434 
00435    if (HS_CustomData.UtilDiv != 0)
00436    {
00437       CurrentUtil = HS_UTIL_PER_INTERVAL_TOTAL - (((HS_CustomData.LastIdleTaskInterval * HS_CustomData.UtilMult1) 
00438                                                   / HS_CustomData.UtilDiv) 
00439                                                  * HS_CustomData.UtilMult2);
00440    }
00441 
00442    return CurrentUtil;
00443 }
00444 
00445 void HS_SetUtilParamsCmd(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr)
00446 {
00447     uint16            ExpectedLength = sizeof(HS_SetUtilParamsCmd_t);
00448     HS_SetUtilParamsCmd_t  *CmdPtr;
00449 
00450     /*
00451     ** Verify message packet length
00452     */
00453     if(HS_VerifyMsgLength(MessagePtr, ExpectedLength))
00454     {
00455         CmdPtr = ((HS_SetUtilParamsCmd_t *)MessagePtr);
00456 
00457         if((CmdPtr->Mult1 != 0) &&
00458            (CmdPtr->Mult2 != 0) &&
00459            (CmdPtr->Div != 0))
00460         {
00461             HS_CustomData.UtilMult1 = CmdPtr->Mult1;
00462             HS_CustomData.UtilMult2 = CmdPtr->Mult2;
00463             HS_CustomData.UtilDiv   = CmdPtr->Div;
00464             HS_AppData.CmdCount++;
00465             CFE_EVS_SendEvent (HS_SET_UTIL_PARAMS_DBG_EID, CFE_EVS_DEBUG,
00466                                "Utilization Parms set: Mult1: %d Div: %d Mult2: %d", 
00467                                (int)HS_CustomData.UtilMult1, (int)HS_CustomData.UtilDiv, (int)HS_CustomData.UtilMult2);
00468         }
00469         else
00470         {
00471             HS_AppData.CmdErrCount++;
00472             CFE_EVS_SendEvent (HS_SET_UTIL_PARAMS_ERR_EID, CFE_EVS_ERROR,
00473                                "Utilization Parms Error: No parameter may be 0: Mult1: %d Div: %d Mult2: %d", 
00474                                (int)CmdPtr->Mult1, (int)CmdPtr->Div, (int)CmdPtr->Mult2);
00475         }
00476     }
00477 
00478     return;
00479 
00480 } /* end HS_SetUtilParamsCmd */
00481 
00482 void HS_SetUtilDiagCmd(CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t MessagePtr)
00483 {
00484     uint16            ExpectedLength = sizeof(HS_SetUtilDiagCmd_t);
00485     HS_SetUtilDiagCmd_t  *CmdPtr;
00486 
00487     /*
00488     ** Verify message packet length
00489     */
00490     if(HS_VerifyMsgLength(MessagePtr, ExpectedLength))
00491     {
00492         HS_AppData.CmdCount++;
00493         CmdPtr = ((HS_SetUtilDiagCmd_t *)MessagePtr);
00494 
00495         HS_CustomData.UtilMask  = CmdPtr->Mask;
00496         CFE_EVS_SendEvent (HS_SET_UTIL_DIAG_DBG_EID, CFE_EVS_DEBUG,
00497                            "Utilization Diagnostics Mask has been set to %08X", 
00498                            (unsigned int)HS_CustomData.UtilMask);
00499     }
00500 
00501     return;
00502 
00503 } /* end HS_SetUtilDiagCmd */
